pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs

faq.question: What are credits?
faq.answer: Credits are the currency used to generate images. 1 generation = 1 credit.

faq.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
faq.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings.

faq.question: Is my payment information secure?
faq.answer: Yes, all payments are processed securely through Stripe.

faq.question: Do unused credits roll over?
faq.answer: No, credits reset at the beginning of each billing cycle.
